name: Bombard of Light
description:
Shoot light at evil little lights so they won't hit and hurt you!

Made in one hour with Java/LibGDX for the 1 hour game jam.

HOW TO PLAY:

You are the purple light, green is your lasers, and reds are enemy lights. Hold left click to shoot lasers at your mouse position. You move toward your mouse position. If you hit an enemy with a laser light, they shrink. If you hit an enemy, you shrink. If you or an enemy gets too small, you/they will die.
